div.p: The third digit of the type of bill (TOB3) submitted on an institutional claim record to indicate the sequence of a claim in the beneficiary's current episode of care. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/clmfreqcd
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

description.value: The third digit of the type of bill (TOB3) submitted on an institutional claim record to indicate the sequence of a claim in the beneficiary's current episode of care. Source: https://bluebutton.cms.gov/resources/variables/clm_freq_cd
